document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Months </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">ends </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Years </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">knot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Power </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">untie </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">stretch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">further </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Skein </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Misery </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Earth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">lays </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">back </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">these </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">tired </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">lives </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">mysterious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Drawers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">tenderly, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">doubt </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">ultimate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Repose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">manner </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Children </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">weary </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Themself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">noisy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Plaything </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">cannot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">put </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The months have ends - the years a knot
